ComicInfo.Summary: As his life falls apart and his world comes crashing down around him, Malcolm Dragon faces the pulse-pounding power of the fighting fowl called Powerhouse!
ComicInfo.Title: The Coolest Guy on the Beach; Face-to-Face With Powerhouse!
